definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The phylogeny and evolution of Rhododendron.
sentences.chinese: 杜鵑屬的系統發育與進化。

sentences.english: Huxley was an exponent of Darwin's theory of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 赫胥黎是達爾文進化論的鼓吹者。

sentences.english: Other workers will engineer a result after months of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 其他工作人員將在進化數月之後監造一個結果。

sentences.english: In evolutionary systems theory these extremes are called "strange attractors".
sentences.chinese: 在進化系統理論這些級端被稱爲“奇怪的引資”。

sentences.english: The pathway could also elucidate how language evolved.
sentences.chinese: 該路徑還可以說明語言是如何進化的。

sentences.english: These are the creatures that provided Darwin with the flash of imagination that led to his theory of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 這也是讓達爾文靈光一現，想到了進化論的生物。

sentences.english: People survive because they are really good cooperators.
sentences.chinese: 人們進化是因爲他們彼此間是最好的合作伙伴。

sentences.english: Some questions about the chromosomal evolution of Vicia are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對野豌豆屬染色體進化的有關問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: One of the lingering challenges in cognitive psychology is the evolution of language.
sentences.chinese: 認知心理學久而未決的挑戰之一便是語言的進化。

sentences.english: Polar bears evolved rapidly from brown bears within the last million years.
sentences.chinese: 北極熊在過去的100萬年來，迅速從棕熊進化而來。

sentences.english: What will the process of evolution create?
sentences.chinese: 進化的過程中將會產生哪些變化？

sentences.english: The common-ancestral selves were unicellular, whereas the animal lineage has elected to construct multicellular selves.
sentences.chinese: 祖先本身是單細胞的，然而動物進化成多細胞。

sentences.english: She said my understanding of Darwinism needed some fine-tuning.
sentences.chinese: 她說我對進化論的理解需要一些微調。

sentences.english: Instead evolution moves in the direction of actualizing itself.
sentences.chinese: 相反，進化的方向是實現自我。

sentences.english: According to the heterotic theory, the algorithm made multi-populations concurrently evolve.
sentences.chinese: 根據雜種優勢理論的原理，算法讓多個種羣同時進化。

sentences.english: I believe that this is an evolved instinct.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是進化出來的本能。

definition: theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
